DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to assess the best method for caring for elders reported to Adult Protective Services (APS) for self-neglect. Specifically, this study will compare APS usual care coupled with interdisciplinary comprehensive geriatric care to APS usual care alone in improving the health and quality of live among elders with substantiated self-neglect.
DOC.brief_title: Multidimensional Assessment and Intervention for Elder Self-Neglect
DOC.criteria: 65 years of age or older English Speaking Resident of Harris County, Houston Texas Communitydwelling Substantiated SelfNeglect No other substantiated allegations Noncommunity dweller No available for projected followup period Impaired decisionmaking with no available proxy Already receiving care from TEAM or within the past year Terminal Illness
